meanings.definition: Send off to a destination or for a purpose.
meanings.sent1: The courier despatched the package to its recipient.
meanings.sent2: The company despatched the order to the customer promptly.
meanings.sent3: The little bird despatched the message to its friends in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The email was despatched across the internet in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The rocket despatched the satellite into orbit smoothly.

meanings.definition: Deal with (a task, problem, or opponent) quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The chef despatched the dinner rush with skill and speed.
meanings.sent2: The detective despatched the case, solving it in record time.
meanings.sent3: The superhero despatched the villain with a clever trick.
meanings.sent4: The athlete despatched the final lap of the race with determination.
meanings.sent5: The teacher despatched the difficult lesson with clarity and patience.
